eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Washington; at 10:26 AM ON DEC 27, 2025 Effective until 11:26 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The Washington State Patrol, on behalf of the Lummi Nation Police Department, has issued an Amber Alert for a 14-year-old female named Cheyanna Howell. Victim is 5 foot 5 inches tall, weighs 200 lbs, has brown hair and brown eyes.   Wearing pink camouflage zip up sweatshirt.  Possibly wearing red pants.   Carrying a grey backpack.   Wears glasses.  Last seen on 12-27-2025 at 02:00 leaving Bellingham, Washington with another individual.  She may be traveling in a White 2003 Lexus LS 4 3 0.   Washington license plate:  C L X 6 6 1 7.  If you have information, please call 9 1 1.
